data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hossain, M. Belal, Hughes, L. E. (2016): New species Victoriopisa bruneiensis and Apocorophium acutum (Chevreux, 1908) from Brunei (Crustacea: Peracarida: Amphipoda). Zootaxa 4117 (3): 375-386, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4117.3.5
